Weather Dashboard

Description

The purpose of this website is to display the weather conditions of any city that a user submits into the search bar. The user can also get the conditions of eight popular cities automatically by pressing the respective buttons. This website uses server-side API (Application Programming Interface) from Open Weather. Once the user submits a city, the UV index will be color-coded to indicate the degree to which the UV conditions are favorable; from most favorable to dangerous, the colors are green, yellow, orange, red, and purple. The conditions for the following five days are displayed below those of the current day. The dashboard can also store up to 12 cities in the search history, which will appear below the grey city buttons after the page is refreshed.
